name: FORRNIF
short_description:
The FORRNIF project seeks to create a standard, easy to use interface for programmers. The ultimate goal of the project is to make programming a Roguelike game easier without removing from the functionality of the code, by abstracting the necessary functions and creating interfaces for future programmers using the project.

FORRNIF itself is a Roguelike and role-playing game series dedicated to finding new ways for computer games to engage users. The first game, FORRNIF, is a role-playing game which puts the player in the role of a dragon and allows it to literally make its mark on the world by creating milestones for future human player characters to find.
summary: An open-source Roguelike programming library and computer game
